hero2: Junior Hardware Engineer, PCB Design, and Embedded Technologies
description: I am a Junior Hardware Engineer passionate about electronics, with experience in the design and implementation of printed circuits for indoor autonomous vehicles. I follow the entire electrical process, from sensor selection to motor integration up to the delivery of the finished product. I am precise, methodical, and have a strong attitude towards problem solving and teamwork. I am proficient in advanced CAD software (such as EasyEDA, Eagle, and Fusion 360) and also handle technical documentation. In my free time, I practice swimming, snowboarding, and I am a blood donor. I am constantly looking for new professional challenges to grow and contribute to innovation.
diploma: Diploma in Electronics and Electrical Engineering
